snippet: Armenia backed out of this year’s Eurovision contest because it will be in the capital of Azerbaijan, Armenia’s adversary in a dispute over the separatist Nagorno-Karabakh region.
abstract: Armenia backs out of Eurovision contest because it will be in the capital of Azerbaijan, Armenia’s adversary in a dispute over the separatist Nagorno-Karabakh region; Armenians had seemed willing to go to Azerbaijan, the home of last year’s winners, until an Armenian soldier was shot to death at the border; Armenian performers called for the pullout and the Armenian public television station agreed.
lead_paragraph: Armenia backed out of this year’s Eurovision contest because it will be in the capital of Azerbaijan, Armenia’s adversary in a dispute over the separatist Nagorno-Karabakh region.

headline.seo: Armenia Shuns Eurovision, Hosted by Azerbaijan, a Rival
headline.main: Armenians Are Shunning Song Contest in Azerbaijan
headline.print_headline: Armenians Are Shunning Song Contest In Azerbaijan
